test_strategy_covers_all_types.details: Unit (21 cases), regression (209 baseline), manual validation (10 protocols), integration assessment (2 chains). Security and performance N/A (prompt-engineering feature with no network/credential operations).

test_cases_exist_for_all_requirements.details: All 10 FRs, 7 NFRs, and 38 ACs have at least one test case or manual validation protocol.

traceability_matrix_complete.details: 38/38 ACs mapped to test cases. 7/7 NFRs mapped. 6/6 constraints verified. 100% coverage.

coverage_targets_defined.details: 100% coverage target for new readMetaJson() defensive default code paths. Regression: all 209 existing tests must pass.

test_data_strategy_documented.details: Test data uses legacyMeta() fixture pattern from existing test suite. Elaboration records use defined schema.

critical_paths_identified.details: Critical paths: defensive defaults for elaborations[], elaboration_config, write cycle round-trips, regression (unchanged behaviors), legacy migration coexistence.

article_II.details: Test cases designed before implementation (Phase 05 before Phase 06). 21 automated unit tests + 10 manual validation protocols designed.

article_VII.details: Traceability matrix created with 100% requirement-to-test mapping (38 ACs, 7 NFRs, 6 constraints).

article_IX.details: All GATE-05 checklist items passed. Test strategy, test cases, and traceability matrix produced.

article_XI.details: Integration chains designed (TC-E20, TC-E21) validating read-write-read cycle and append-not-replace behavior.
